Service.Name: WMS
Service.Title: GeoServer Web Map Service
Service.Abstract: A compliant implementation of WMS 1.1.1 plus most of the SLD 1.0 extension (dynamic styling). Can also generate PDF, SVG, KML, GeoRSS
